Simple App written in Kotlin used to make notes through the commentaries on code to study some topics of Android Development.
Furthermore the project is used to take practice with the newest Android Jetpack libraries that sometimes I can\'t use at work.
This project is a new version from AndroidNotes project which uses Java 8 and MVP architecture.

Simple App with Kotlin used to make notes through the commentaries on code to study some topics of Android Development. Furthermore the project is used to take practice with the newest Android Jetpack libraries that sometimes I can\'t use at work. This project is a new version from AndroidNotes project which uses Java 8 and MVP architecture.
Show animations on views layouts (ConstraintLayout only) or values making use of ValueAnimatorto graduate heights and constraints which is managed with ConstrainSet instead LayoutParams

Display a list of users called from https://reqres.in API REST. The communication is achieved with MVVM architecture using ViewModel and LiveData from Android Jetpack, Dagger2 as a dependency injector, Retrofit to fetch the data from de API REST and RxJava to subscribe the responses.
Permissions implementation to access to gallery, camera, location, etc. for Android API 23 and above.
